title: CF fonts
content:
Hi there,

I was wondering on what CF fonts are. Is CF a company? Does it mean Custom Font? I can't seem to find anything on google... Thanks!
author: aitor314

comments.content: Do you mean OpenType CFF fonts?
No, plain CF fonts. Like CF Garamond or CF Jill for example.

Looks like they are fonts from [Cannibal Fonts (Fonts.gr)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042405/http:/www.fonts.gr/arxiki/el/cat/2/) by [Panos Haratzopoulos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042405/https:/www.typotheque.com/authors/panos_haratzopoulos), which is specialized in doing greek fonts.
That must be it. Thank you Renko and all :)
